channel.title: Help With GetTextAtEx
channel.description:
Ok so I'm writing my own little scripter thingy to buy things in bulk, and i've got it all working now except for this little stumper:
ESS:=StrToInt(GetTextAtEx(326,72,130,Trade1Chars,false,false,0,10,6619135,25,false,tr_Digits))
I need it to find the amount that the other player has offered, after that everything is perfect but this just doesn't seem to work, I run the script and it goes until someone trades, then it opens up the trade and then the person offers and then it stops so i check the debug box and I get this:
Successfully compiled [Runtime Error] : Exception: ' ' is not a valid integer value in line 30 in script C:\Users\******\Desktop\******\Scar\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\BulkBuyer.scar
(Line 30 in the script is the GetTextAtEx part, I'm not that blunt)
(The ' * ' in the path is what I put in to block names)
Anyone?

item.title: Help With GetTextAtEx
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

I don’t know how to do the x.y coords though because they will always change depending on the number it is, because a 1 is more skinny than a 7, its meant to read how many essence the other person has offered, and in the trade manu the numbers are alligned to the right so i dunno wat to do lol, is there a GetTextIn function? cuz that would be awesome where you give all the parameters in gettextatex with x,y begin var, and has sx,sy,ax,ay or sumthin like that[br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2007, 04:05:14 PM[/size][hr]anybody else know?

Read full topic

item.title: Help With GetTextAtEx
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

[quote=“deathbyvirus, post:3, topic:57874”]does the coords of x,y have to be exact?[/quote]Yes. At first it might feel pretty hard to get the correct coordinates, but you’ll get used to it. Just make somekind of script that detects and adds everytime 1 to x or y, until it finds the text, as it will be much faster than actually changing the coordinates yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With GetTextAtEx
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

ahh know what you mean, and thats what I have, ESS is an integer variable, and i’ve got the StrToInt thingy on there so it all works, i just don’t get why its crashin :(, does the coords of x,y have to be exact?

Read full topic

item.title: Help With GetTextAtEx
item.dc:creator: @ejjman1 ejjman1
item.description:
@ejjman1 wrote:

I had the same, I don’t remember what I did.

BUt…

Howbout make a string variable, like SString

SString := GetTextAtEx(blahblah);

Now, go…

ESS := StrToInt(SString);

I dunno if that would change it. :\

Read full topic
